description: Describes the details of a pipeline execution.

parameters.name: PipelineExecutionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline execution.

nested_items.name: PipelineArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline.

nested_items.name: PipelineExecutionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline execution.

nested_items.name: PipelineExecutionDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the pipeline execution.

nested_items.name: PipelineExecutionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the pipeline execution.

nested_items.name: PipelineExecutionDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the pipeline execution.

nested_items.name: PipelineExperimentConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the names of the experiment and trial created by a pipeline.

nested_items.name: ExperimentName
nested_items.description: The name of the experiment.

nested_items.name: TrialName
nested_items.description: The name of the trial.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: If the execution failed, a message describing why.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the pipeline execution was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the pipeline execution was modified last.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user who created or modified an experiment, trial, trial component, lineage group, project, or model card.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user who created or modified an experiment, trial, trial component, lineage group, project, or model card.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: ParallelismConfiguration
nested_items.description: The parallelism configuration applied to the pipeline.

nested_items.name: MaxParallelExecutionSteps
nested_items.description: The max number of steps that can be executed in parallel.

nested_items.name: SelectiveExecutionConfig
nested_items.description: The selective execution configuration applied to the pipeline run.

nested_items.name: SourcePipelineExecutionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN from a reference execution of the current pipeline. Used to copy input collaterals needed for the selected steps to run. The execution status of the pipeline can be either Failed or Success.

nested_items.name: SelectedSteps
nested_items.description: A list of pipeline steps to run. All step(s) in all path(s) between two selected steps should be included.

nested_items.name: StepName
nested_items.description: The name of the pipeline step.
